mapper.select: SELECT c.coupon_id as couponId, c.coupon_name as couponName, c.coupon_rate * 100 as couponRate, cu.flag as useFlag, TO_CHAR(cu.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(cu.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, cu.user_id as userId FROM sm_coupon_user cu JOIN sm_coupon c ON cu.coupon_id = c.coupon_id where cu.user_id = #{userId}
